Package com.install4j.api.styles

Interface ControlButton

  • public interface ControlButton
    Implemented by form components that want to handle navigation functionality for a style.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void focusControlButton()
      Called when the control button is focused.
      ControlButtonType getControlButtonType()
      Called by the framework to check the type of the control button.
      void setControlButtonText​(java.lang.String text)
      Called when the control button text is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • setControlButtonText

        void setControlButtonText​(java.lang.String text)
        Called when the control button text is changed. This is called each time when a screen is activated, but it can also be triggered programatically by a call to WizardContext.setControlButtonText(ControlButtonType, String).
        Parameters:
        text - the text for the button

      • getControlButtonType

        ControlButtonType getControlButtonType()
        Called by the framework to check the type of the control button. If your form component can handle multiple ControlButtonTypes, implement ControlButtonContainer instead.
        Returns:
        the control button type

      • focusControlButton

        void focusControlButton()
        Called when the control button is focused. This is triggered programatically by a call to WizardContext.focusControlButton(ControlButtonType).
